Room.Name: West Tower Stairway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the stairway leading up the western tower of the Kista Towers.
Room.LongDescription: The tower staircase appears to spiral up infinitely into the sky. The further you progress up the stairway, the further away the top appears to get. There is an odd, musty smell in the stairwell that puzzles you. It doesn't look like this stairway is used often, although you know the towers are inhabited. There must be some sort of great magic at the top of these stairs.
